FuncDef: This command allows the user to configure different ranges in the connection-profile-vlan. The ranges have the following characteristics:

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the beginning of the vlan-range associated to the connection-profile-vlan. Values-1 to 4094.
Specifies the end of the vlan-range associated to the connection-profile-vlan. If not specified, the vlan-range is comprised of only the from VLAN ID. Values-1 to 4094.

ExtraInfo: Default: noneEach vlan-range must be explicitly configured.
